author: Koimoi.Com Team
title: Alia Bhatt, Varun Dhawan, Javed Ali, Sukhwinder Singh & many more at Kala Ghoda Arts Festival 2017 closing ceremony!
text: tweet The last day of the Kala Ghoda Festival was filled with star appearances, music performances, dances, cooking demos & workshops. Alia Bhatt & Varun Dhawan sizzled on stage with a song & dance from their latest movie Badrinath Ki Dulhania & the crowd went crazy! Performances by Javed Ali & Sukhwinder Singh had the audience dancing & asking for more. Kala Ghoda Arts Festival 2017 closing ceremony! Kala Ghoda Arts Festival 2017 closing ceremony!
